channel.title: [Delta]Original ForeverPkers Release - Extreme Stability
channel.description:
Okay well this is my first release, EVER. This is the original ForeverPkers Server, which is Delta. At one time it had 4000 votes on Mopar which was #1, and when 4000 votes was a lot o.o.. Anyways, it's very high quality for Delta, in my opinion. It was coded by a few pretty good coders, which ended up screwing me over and taking down the server.
During the time of those coders, they made it pretty stable, pretty fast, and removed all known dupes for Delta servers. I can guarantee there aren't any dupes that can be done easily on this source anymore. I can also guarantee that if there do happen to be dupes, the player is instantly banned by the checkDupe();, which checks a players inventory and bank for excessive amounts of items (e.g. 100+ partyhats or 1000+ godswords)
This being said, it's also very fast. I was using a VPS that was 2GB Ram, and not very good stats (I don't remember) and it supported 200 players WHICH WAS OUR MAX EVER without lag, so I don't know how many players it would support on the same system. It's pretty stable and quick as I said.
Most skills work, PvP is really nice, it began with the Edgeville Pking source, which was my foundation when I was a noob (Which I still am kinda..)
Here's an old PvP video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Lm9XvYcdXXs
Take a look at some pictures..
[URL=http://img20.imageshack.us/i/pic1ea.png/][IMG]http://img20.imageshack.us/img20/2176/pic1ea.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img713.imageshack.us/i/pic2t.png/][IMG]http://img713.imageshack.us/img713/9673/pic2t.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img816.imageshack.us/i/pic3r.png/][IMG]http://img816.imageshack.us/img816/7218/pic3r.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img810.imageshack.us/i/pic4a.png/][IMG]http://img810.imageshack.us/img810/9891/pic4a.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img510.imageshack.us/i/pic5l.png/][IMG]http://img510.imageshack.us/img510/4991/pic5l.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img403.imageshack.us/i/pic6o.png/][IMG]http://img403.imageshack.us/img403/4968/pic6o.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img525.imageshack.us/i/pic7t.png/][IMG]http://img525.imageshack.us/img525/4751/pic7t.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img254.imageshack.us/i/pic8.png/][IMG]http://img254.imageshack.us/img254/1543/pic8.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img580.imageshack.us/i/pic9o.png/][IMG]http://img580.imageshack.us/img580/1610/pic9o.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img403.imageshack.us/i/pic10.png/][IMG]http://img403.imageshack.us/img403/2483/pic10.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img413.imageshack.us/i/pic11x.png/][IMG]http://img413.imageshack.us/img413/4160/pic11x.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img84.imageshack.us/i/pic12v.png/][IMG]http://img84.imageshack.us/img84/1061/pic12v.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img249.imageshack.us/i/pic13.png/][IMG]http://img249.imageshack.us/img249/3250/pic13.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img809.imageshack.us/i/pic14.png/][IMG]http://img809.imageshack.us/img809/6884/pic14.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img814.imageshack.us/i/pic15.png/][IMG]http://img814.imageshack.us/img814/3494/pic15.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img401.imageshack.us/i/pic16.png/][IMG]http://img401.imageshack.us/img401/1263/pic16.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img577.imageshack.us/i/pic17.png/][IMG]http://img577.imageshack.us/img577/3350/pic17.png[/img][/URL]
Additional Information: 80% of the skills are trainable, and I'm not going to say "Perfect skilling" because most skills do NOT work like they would in real RS. E.G. Smithing gives gold instead of items, and it's a good way of making cash. Void armour works, and so does Pest Control, pretty well. There is a tormented demon to fight Many custom items like Statius and bleh, I don't even remember tbh. All GWD bosses and minions are in the client WITH correct animations and emotes Eh it has a ton of shit is what I'm saying.. Try it out for yourself.
This download is a client/server package.
Mediafire Download: http://www.mediafire.com/?7vz3oma19m2orm7
Please leave comments below that aren't trash. Meaning don't say anything about it being Delta, try it out before you call it shit. I agree Delta is bad but some people still enjoy them.
Credits: Myself MoparScape community Demise who created the original base, Edgeville Pking

[quote=“spaceharsh, post:36, topic:372829”]===GLITCHS===
HELLO jimmy thankyou for giving us such a good source. yout server is really good.
===TRADE GLITCH!===
I found out glitch while trading.Its like when we first trade with someone else the trade box closes automatically and we have to trade again.(2nd time it works)
===ITEM DROP GLITCH===
WHEN i go pking with my firend on edgeville 1vs1pvp my items are not dropped
===EXTRA INFO===
I HAVE MADE MYSELF OWNER SO WILL IT EFFECT ON ITEM DROPPING? I MEAN COULD IT BE THE REASON FOR MY ITEMS NOT DROPPING.
ILL REP++ IF SOMEONE HELPS ME OUT.[/quote]
well it’s called the server help section, dont gravedig a topic from 2010…

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta]Original ForeverPkers Release - Extreme Stability
item.dc:creator: @PLayRooney PLayRooney
item.description:
@PLayRooney wrote:

[quote=“Mendorphins, post:26, topic:372829”][quote author=PLayRooney link=topic=468850.msg3430741#msg3430741 date=1292306488]

Wow, nice reaction by the people here. Makes a change. Can anyone confirm the stability claims?

Looks good by the information and media you supplied (I liked the points system for the actual whole system, good idea to use for contributons to nearly every aspect).

8 out of 10 I guess Enjoy the +13.

I Believe it is insanely stable due to i used a bot to see how many players it could hold. i got up to 511or 5112 And it got a bit laggy
[/quote]

511 or 5112? That’s a big difference.[/quote]
512* you know what i meant

Read full topic
